Key Match Events: Seiya Suzuki went 2-for-2 with two walks in the Cubs' 3-0 victory against the Reds
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Craig Counsell announced that Shota Imanaga will not start Sunday
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Craig Counsell praised Suzuki for his all-around offensive season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seiya Suzuki has replicated his production from 2023 in a season with down MLB-wide offense
Suzuki entered Saturday hitting.330 with a.976 OPS in the last five weeks, putting him in the top 10 among qualified hitters in both categories
Others: Suzuki was sidelined for two games with a sprained right ankle
